Best game on earth

GET FRIENDS TO PLAY WITH!!!!!! I cannot stress this any further, if by any chance you still want to play this game, play only with friends that already have the game, do not encourage others to purchase this, it's only fun at the start and that immediately goes down an unfortunate drain, Killers are completely f over, survivors will always win (unless the killer chooses to camp everyone, + tedious leveling system that makes you want to die, there are plenty of other fun games and Roblox even has a game similar to this, (in fact nearly ripped off) That is actually better, also there will be no dogshit human beings who think they are the best for playing on an advantaged side, (mind my spelling im tired and pissed) And here are some ways they can improve the game (if they even care)

1. Previously Said Roblox Game Literally had a anti Camping mechanism where the  process will be halted if said killer was near by, while trash killers will still find a way to camp, this would make it harder to.

2. I f i want to post a picture of pay to play, this would be it, most movie killers are walled behind a while cheap, yet noticeable paywall, this includes their perks as well, same thing with survivors, and what makes this worse is they tend to have some of the best perks in the game,

3. Give the Generators more time, holy crap was this annoying, my main tactic when i play as killer is to go to the farthest generator as your maps tends to be quite predictable, however every time i do such and chase one person, by the time the chase begins a generator has already been finished and your left going wtf?, and not in a good way, also for being a killer, you feel slow and lumbering despite being somewhat faster than the player, (i like playing as Oni, that could be just the fact that he is slow or something, and if so disregard such complaint) by lengthening the time of generators it could give the hunter some chance to counter rather than just feel like if they dont constantly monitor the generators, they will lose, (which is already a losing battle.

3. give people access to the purchasable character perks, i know then no one will want to purchase your characters then but unfortunately thats not a good wall to have in the first place, as unfortunately those perks tend to be the absolute best, so you fuq over the people who just wanna fork over a 20 and play with randos (which I do not recommend)

4.your pass is dogshit, just like everyone else's pass, We may give Fortnite shit for their battle pass but honestly their battle pass is one of the best out there and continues to be, and thats because you potentially could earn more than what you spend,( you fork a 10 and you have the potentioal to recieve 1500 V bucks which is about 15 bucks irl think about that) unfortunately just like every game now with said pass, you copied it but with a shittier design, less cosmetics, nothing new to the table (cosmetic wise not gameplay wise), and you dont have the potential to earn it all back, like everyone else who makes such a pass,, the pass is there to encourage playing and rewards playing the game, most now are just purchase packages with little to no rewards,

Honestly i want to go through more however  i want to go to bed, and i just wan to sum it all up...

tmi: fix yo game, and improve on the things that clearly need to be improved, i dont want another struggle design, i want  a balance design. dont purchse or encourage to purchase unless you already have friends who play it.
Killer > Surv aber einfach geiles Game xoxo

The gameplay itself is fun at it's core for both survivor and killer, but the current meta rn sucks the soul out of this game. I'll give the game a thumbs up if the meta changes and also matchmaking improvements are made.

Great devs who care, better community than League and Rust combined. I want to invent a time machine to go back and make sure i spend all my time or money on this game.

If you do happen to fall for the cool licensed killers and actually try to play this game, just remember:
-- Playing survivor with friends is fun as you cyber bully and enrichen the life of anyone else you play with/against (some of the time).
-- Playing solo survivor is like eating a delicious warm apple pie with a serving of creamy custard/choccy icecream
-- And not playing this game is like watching you life long enemy ♥♥♥♥ your wife while you are being slowly tortured to death by a professional who knows the exact spots to cause as much pain as possible for as long as possible, and just as you think you'll die and get some relief you find out they have invented some sort of life giving potion that not only prolongs your life, it will grow back any extremities you lost form the torture (so they can take them away again) AND this potion also seems to make your senses more sensitive so that the pain only gets worse every second. And that just represents one game as killer.

Before the MMR changes i wouldve loved to recommend this game. But now i can't. I did climb to Rank 1 on both survivor and killer, i understand that requires a certain amount of skill to do and part of that skill stays with you. playing before we could get newish killer and it would be a stomp. Or as a killer going against a bunch of new survs and the same stomp. But now every game is playing your utmost just to pray you can get hatch or get a 3k or 4k. If there was a difference in queues between an actual ranked that rewards playing your best and a more casual queue to run non meta perks i would love this game again. But I'm over the meta sweat fest this game has become.

Обожаю эту игру за те моменты эйфории когда:
- тебя снимают с крюка на последней стадии без часов перед убийцей
- когда чел в команде ходит сейвит спринт 4 гена
- когда против легиона твоя команда всю игру лечится, хотя я слышал, что в игре нужно генераторы заводить?
- когда тебя снимают тиммейты с крюка под ноедом, фанатением, выбором за тобой, пожиранием надежды, проклятой землей (одновременно), возле убийцы. 
и т.д.
И да, тот факт, что медуза прожила более 600 млн лет без мозгов, дает надежду многим твоим тиммейтам!

If I'm being honest, I love this game amazing base gameplay, great licenses and even better original killer design.

Where this game falls apart is everything else, the meta hasn't changed in nearly 6 years and has become extremely stale. The devs have no idea how to play their own game and have expressed on multiple ocassions they have no idea what skill is. To win as killer you have to play as a complete asshole (Camping, tunnelling etc) because of the fact that survivors immediately have so many things in their favour, such as spawns, gen spread, pallet spread. Patches and balance changes only come out every 6 weeks, and they are so slow to fix the many many bugs this game has. 

I would love to reccomend this game, but due to the underlying issues, I unfortunately cannot. Maybe if they fix at least a few of these problems, I will be inclined to change this review

I am so sick of seeing nurses everywhere. I have so many hours in this game. This game USED to be fun. You've ran it into the ground, and your community is garbage. Nearly everyone is toxic, and hateful. Killers exist to face camp you, tunnel you, and make sure you don't have a good time. And if it's not them doing something, it's your toxic teammates trolling you. You've nerfed every fun survivor perk so there's a small meta of things that are actually viable compared to the arsenal of perks that actually exist. 

But hey, at least you added a chat filter that makes sure we can't type anything. It just completely blocks out random things. Half of the fun was being able to type to others. You took that away too. 

ALSO LET'S NOT FORGET ALL THE HACKERS THAT THIS GAME HAS! INSTANTLY FINISHING EVERY GEN, OR INSTANTLY KILLING EVERY SURVIVOR. AMAZING JOB DEVS. Keep milking those skins, and not caring about the people abusing and ruining your game. What could go wrong? 

I don't recommend this game anymore. It was fun at one point, but now it's just trash. I won't be playing this anytime soon.

"This game is really fun, I enjoy playing as the survivor rather than the killers, cus' it's less stressed and just go hide and fix generator, also rescue a survivor, just over all fun times,"

"But the community is exceptionally toxic, playing as the survivor and being camp by a low ranked killers, is really something, especially by getting camp and they keep hitting you with their weapons, also the survivor is the same as the killers, especially when one survivor DC, they all just straight up quit the match and left me by myself, what a fun game to play"

"but hey atleast they giving us a bunch of licensed DLC lol, also fuck you Netflix for taking stranger things back"

"Now, how I rate it"

Is it worth your time: Yeah if yah want to just fix generators, open gate, and play hide and seek, or just basically kill anyone if you like,

Game play: It's fun, but bro fix the hit box, huntress just straight up snipe me even tho I'm behind the wall, also balance the game, some killers is unbalance compared to the survivor, and some survivor is unbalance compared to the killers, might be the perks lol,

Game modes: only one game mode available, I want more, but knowing the community is Toxic af, I'll just shut my mouth to please the community,

Mechanics: be an engineer, that's all, or you can be a psychopath, and kill everyone for your own pleasure,

Hit box: BAD

Controls: I may say that the controls is decent, it's smooth, and I actually don't have a problem with it,

Graphics: It's decent, not a AAA kind of Graphics, but it's good,

Characters: I really like the Licensed Characters behaviour picked, and also the original characters they made, Cheryl main here btw,

Price: decent, it's not around AAA kind of price, I will say you can actually buy this game, it's cheap enough for a viable option to play an Asymmetrical Horror Game, and it's famous one of all the games that have the same concept as DBD, except all the free games, but hey atleast DBD looks decent for the graphics and gameplay, even tho I been critical to it lol,

Community: Decent, but TOXIC,

Final Thoughts: ehhhhh.... it's a decent game,

Overall Scores: 7/10

"why??, they haven't release a licensed chapters that I want, oh wait, Sadako Rising is the latest DLC...... and it's my favorite horror movie of all time....."

"NVM, I changed my mind, 10/10 just because Sadako is in the game, good game, please buy it :>>>>>"

Recommend: HECK YES!!!!

"but for seriousness, yeah I love the game, I bought like 10 DLC now, what more can yah say about that lol,"

It's a pretty fun game playing both as the survivor and the attacker. Great game to play with Friends.

Over the past nine months this game has gone downhill. They implemented a disgustingly bad matchmaking system that never works, the developers don't seem to know what they're doing, the game is rife with bugs and glitches, perks are unbalanced, the game is plagued by hackers, and the average player-count has been consistently dropping over the past six months. As of right now, this game is no-longer the fun game that I used to enjoy. The problem is that it's the only live game that offers this kind of experience.

Edit: A lot of new changes and features were announced on the anniversary stream, which will hopefully bring this game back to at least a decent amount of its former glory. I hope that I will be able to revise this review as positive after these changes are implemented.

Dead by Daylight is a treasure of a game, it is one hell of a grind and intimidating to start fresh on giving how large the roster of characters has gotten. but the extensive grind is nothing but pure fun. Some really frustrating killers and SWF teams but for the most part its a fun competitive challenge. I do think the cost of getting all the characters at this point is outrageous and could be a real turn off for some players given such game breaking perks can be locked behind a paywall until the shrine is available. between console and PC I have hundreds of hours in this game and I am not one for playing a singular game for too long especially years on end but this game has been a true delight and a one of a kind title that brings something special to the table in the niche 4 vs 1 game scene.

Really love this game, only a couple things to say about it.
Pros: Fun game Play, not to easy, different ways to play, make connections and work together, AND OH MY THE LORE IS GREAT
Cons: The DLCS have to be bought separately, which really sucks when you dont have a lot of income like me. Even if you are being hook camped you still lose blood, which really sucks when facing a childish killer. 

Advise to add to the game: Maybe a quest web to unlock different costumes. It doesn't have to be easy, but its a good alternative for people like me. 

ADVISE TO PLAYERS: If you lag, check your connection, but also turn down your graphics quality all the way. Work your way back up to the sweetspot your computer can handle.

That's all I got for yal, Goodday.
